ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_sacrifice: Damages both yourself and the opponent. Amplify increases the amount of damage taken and the amount of damage dealt.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_water_spea: Summons a spear of water, piercing the enemy and dealing damage.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_rotate_90: Rotates the targeted entity by 90 degrees. Can be increased with amplify and dampen.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_sword: Summons a sword which ignores most defences.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_swap_posit: Swaps the position of the user and the target.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_exp_sac: Sacrifices a portion of the experience bar to deal damage. Scales with Amplify and the total amount of exp (only the current level)
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_shadow_vei: Traps the enemy in a veil of slowing darkness.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_sound_boom: Creates an explosion of sound, which will ripple across multiple enemies. Does not harm the caster. Scales with amplify and AOE
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_sun_flare: The sun's blinding light punishes the evils.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_mana_bomb:
Launches a spiritual bomb at the target, dealing damage based on the used mana. Consume ALL mana.
Augment with AOE to get more range.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_sel: Stops the spell from resolving if the target entity is not the caster.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_not: Stops the spell from resolving if the target entity is the caster.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_devour_sou:
Devour the soul of your enemy, as long as you possess a soul vastly superior to their own. May or may not have negative effects.
Unfinished texture.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_devour:
Deals damage at your enemy, sapping their health and healing you. Use Amplify to deal more damage.
Unfinished texture.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_aura:
An aura that has effect 5 blocks around the player. Use AOE to increase the radius of the aura, extend time to increase the duration. Use amplify to make the aura cover every block around the player. Use dampen to make the aura a half sphere from where the player is standing upwards. Use sensitive to make the aura a half sphere from where the player is standing downwards. Use sensitive to affect entities instead of blocks.
From the Ars Titans Project.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_overhead:
Targets the spell on the block above the player.
originally from the Ars Omega project
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_missile: Similar to projectile, but with a short duration and will explode when it expires, casting the spell in the air (or on a nearby target, if found).
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_propagate_: Casts the rest of the spell as a missile from the target.
Casts the rest of the spell from the self form. Can have another propagate afterwards to make it behave like a default form.
Moves the spell to the block above the target. Moves more blocks upwards with amplify.
Casts the rest of the spell as a projectile from the target.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_propagte_u: Moves the spell to the block below the target. Moves more blocks downwards with amplify.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_soul_inspe: Inspects the soul of the entity you are casting this spell on.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_random_25: Will continue the spell 25% of the time.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_random_50: Will continue the spell 50% of the time.
ars_trinkets.glyph_desc.glyph_random_75: Will continue the spell 75% of the time.
text.ars_trinkets.souls.breakthrough.unh: Your soul burst out with a black light as it attempts to mutate to become able to contain more darkness.
text.ars_trinkets.souls.breakthrough.hol: Your soul burst out with a bright light as it attempts to evolve to become able to contain more light.
text.ars_trinkets.new_soul_core: You are forming a new core !
text.ars_trinkets.max_soul_core: You cannot form any more cores !
text.ars_trinkets.souls.overflow: Your soul shows signs of cracking, as its fragile shell struggles to withstand the occult energies coursing through it.
text.ars_trinkets.souls.consumed: You absorbed a dead soul. Your soul darkens.
text.ars_trinkets.souls.essence_used: You absorbed Astral Essence. Your soul whitens
text.ars_trinkets.souls.approach_madness: Your soul shakes as it approaches corruption
text.ars_trinkets.souls.madness: Your soul shatters as it falls to madness. You are now a member of the Profanes, and this curse will accompany your soul beyond life and death.
text.ars_trinkets.souls.bloated: You feel a shiver run down your spine as your soul starts to feel full.
text.ars_trinkets.souls.finished: You already have a flawless Soul !
text.ars_trinkets.souls.whispers.lookat: You are looking at the soul of a
text.ars_trinkets.souls.whispers.forbidd: You can not peer through this soul !
text.ars_trinkets.souls.warning_corrupti: You approach madness as you feast on your killed foes.
